Abstract: Officer Mr. Sminish. U. Reimbursement of the medical expenses incurred by the wife of , Nikati Department
Subsection: Excise Administrative Civil Excise in Kannur Division
Order Status: An order is issued authorizing the issuance.
Body:
Civil Excise Officer of Kannur Division Mr.Sminish.U -
from 07.06.2021 at Aster Mims Hospital, Kozhikode for the treatment of his wife.
Kannur District Medical Officer on the amount spent till 05.07.2021
71,418/- as medical reinvestment of Rs.71,418/- as admissible
Ecclesiastical Commissioner recommends under reference (3) to allow
Did it.

2) The government has looked into the matter in detail. Civil in Kannur Division
Excise Officer Mr. Sminish U. Kozhikode for treatment of wife of -
Aster Mims Hospital from 07.06.2021 to 05.07.2021! Out of the amount spent upto
71,418/- of the amount notified by the District Medical Officer to be allowed
57.134/- (Rupees Fifty Seven Thousand One Hundred Thirty Four Only) which is 80%
It is hereby ordered that compensation be granted.
